Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

This is my little  Tiel ScruffyDoo, she died about 3 years ago, she is 
buried under the rose bush  near my window, she was around 12 years old when she 
passed, this is her voice,  I would know her anywhere, she had a history 
with me, even our pets live on,  this file brought me to tears.
